page.title: 14FRED DIBNAH-STEEPLEJACK
page.content: The local steeplejack and television personalty, 47 year old Fred Dibnah lives at Park Cottage on Radcliffe Road. He has repaired chimneys since the age of 24 (before which he was a joiner) and he has demolished approximately 60 without the use of explosives. He has also removed the spire and lantern from St. Stephen & All Martyrs Church of England. He recalls that his most frightening moment was when he was repairing the sides of a well. At the age of 7 he became interested in steam engines, at fairgrounds. He now owns 3 steam engines, the first which he bought from a Welsh scrap metal merchant for Â£175 and after restoring it,called it Alison after his wife. He spends his spare time working with steam engines.
